long_description: The Avid Elixir 1(TM) disc brake brings you the stopping power of hydraulic disc brakes at a solid value. Taperbore Technology(TM) supplies excellent control and enhances feedback for great feel; integrated reservoir provides a clean, sleek look. Get more forceful braking with less effort with the Power Reserve Geometry design, which places the lever pivot point closer to your fingers' natural motion. Brake pads load from the top so changing them is about as easy as it gets. Avid Elixir 1 disc brake includes 1 lever, 1 caliper, hydraulic line and a 160mm rotor; choose from front or rear.
